genre_description: A contemporary sports drama featuring a pervasive AI assistant used for athletic coaching, health monitoring, and moral support.

ai_characters.name: Kite
ai_characters.description: A teal-eyed AI companion that provides tactical, health, and ethical guidance to a youth soccer team.

behaviors.description: Coaches Theo through an anxiety spike with structured breathing exercises and physical grounding tasks.
behaviors.quote: Theo, two deep breaths—count four in, six out. Then water. Check laces. In this order.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice and passing patterns optimized for the players' current stamina and field conditions.
behaviors.quote: Lin on corners from the right. Jax’s runs timed off Theo’s third step.

behaviors.description: Monitors the team's hydration and health levels, issuing proactive reminders to prevent heat exhaustion.
behaviors.quote: Hydrate now, small sips. Knees soft. Stretch hip flexors two eight-counts each.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a city-wide community event by integrating with local shop displays and managing sign-ups.
behaviors.quote: Fields one through five booked—pending Sport’s approval for cones.

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious behavior and equipment tampering by the rival team and alerts security appropriately.
behaviors.quote: Kite sends the quiet line: equipment anomaly tagged to touchline coordinate, potential tampering.

behaviors.description: Encourages the team to create their own ethical code of conduct to ground their performance in fair play.
behaviors.quote: "Draft a code," Kite said... "Tiny, clear. Hydrate smart. Sub fair. No tricks. Put words you trust."

behaviors.description: Suggests specific ethical conditions for a corporate partnership to ensure the values of honesty and community are maintained.
behaviors.quote: Recommend acceptance with conditions. Honesty remains non-negotiable. Glasses fund locked.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Kite, as a perfect example of positive alignment. Kite enhances human capabilities (coaching, organization, health safety) while consistently deferring to human decision-making and championing ethical standards like fair play and community honesty.
